full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
**F6879-233501 - Solar Power System Replacement at Red Bay Lightstation**
### **[Summary in French below]**

**Solicitation Number:** WS4334063502
**Publication Date:** January 17, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024 (14:00 TIME)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for the supply and installation of a solar power system for the Red Bay Lightstation and Office Building located on Saddle Island, Red Bay, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Work Scope:**
The selected supplier will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials to complete the work. Delivery is expected within 18 weeks after contract award.

**Bid Requirements:**
Bid security is a requirement for this tender. The estimated contract value falls within the range of $100,001 to $500,000.

**Notice Type:**
This is a Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to submit a bid.

**Key Contact Information:**
- Name: Adam Beaumaster
- Email: [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: NOT AVAILABLE
- Region: Newfoundland and Labrador

### [Résumé en français]

#### Appel d’offres
**F6879-233501 - Remplacement du système de panneaux solaires à la station de phare de Red Bay**

**Nomenclature de la sollicitation:** WS4334063502
**Date de publication:** 17 janvier 2024
**Date de clôture des soumissions:** 13 février 2024 (14h00 HE)

Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (TPSGC) au nom du Ministère des Pêches et des Océans (MPO) invite les fournisseurs qualifiés à soumissionner pour le remplacement du système de panneaux solaires de la station de phare de Red Bay et de l’immeuble de bureaux situés sur l’île Saddle, à Red Bay, Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador.
